subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Television
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: ABC’s lengthy run-up to the Belmont Stakes was almost entirely about Big Brown. No reporters followed any horse and trainer but Big Brown and Rick Dutrow.
snippet: ABC’s lengthy run-up to the Belmont Stakes was almost entirely about Big Brown. No reporters followed any horse and trainer but Big Brown and Rick Dutrow.
